      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        To be called from the host android.app.Activity's android.app.Activity#onCreate. Calls the registered Bundler's Bundler.onLoad(android.os.Bundle) methods. To avoid redundant calls to Presenter.onLoad(android.os.Bundle) it's best to call this before android.app.Activity#setContentView.

      • onSaveInstanceState

        public void onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle outState)
        To be called from the host android.app.Activity's android.app.Activity#onSaveInstanceState. Calls the registrants' Bundler.onSave(android.os.Bundle) methods.
